sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Mat√©riel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>checkAttachments</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	if(!getAttached()){
       g_form.addErrorMessage("Attachments required !");
		return false;
	}
	
	return true;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-18 21:30:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>551d4a6147630110a06c690cd36d439a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>47</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkAttachments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_551d4a6147630110a06c690cd36d439a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 00:24:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_267b8ba147270110a06c690cd36d43ed
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>checkAttachments</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	if( !getAttached() && g_form.getValue("request_subtype") == 'ad_hoc' ){
       g_form.addErrorMessage("Attachments required !");
		return false;
	}
	
	return true;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-19 02:03:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>267b8ba147270110a06c690cd36d43ed</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkAttachments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_267b8ba147270110a06c690cd36d43ed</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-22 23:40:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ad Hoc / Exceptional Request">a26bf84047a70110a06c690cd36d431f</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
